treatment-md.title: Afroedura leoloensis Jacobsen, Kuhn, Jackman & Bauer, 2014, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A phylogenetic analysis of the southern African gecko genus Afroedura Loveridge (Squamata: Gekkonidae), with the description of nine new species from Limpopo and Mpumalanga provinces of South Africa
